error.missing_cta_channel:
The configuration cta-channel was not set.
Use `$0config --cta-channel "ChannelName"` to set it
error.channel_name_wrong:
Could not find channel with name $0.
Use `$1config --cta-channel "ChannelName"` to set it

help.description: Returns a list of commands, you are able to use or informations about a specific command!

error.unknown:
This command is unknown.
Use `$0help` for a list of commands.
This command is unknown. Use `$0help` for a list of commands.
error.generic_error: There was an Error executing the command `$0$1`.
error.general_format:
Your command is not well formated:
`$0<Command> [args] [--<option> [option-arg]]`
error.args_format:
Your arguments are not well formated.
*Hint: Arguments with spaces must be surrounded by one " and cannot contain any additional "*
error.params_format:
Your options are not well formated.
*Hint: Options must start with '--' and __can__ contain one additional argument.*

labels.usage: React with the shown number to execute that command!
